Questions.Question: Is sample analyzed within seven (7) days after collection?
Is sample preserved at 4°C?
Is glass fiber filter a Whatman Grade-934Ah Gelman Type E, Millipore Type Ap4o, or equivalent?
Are analytical balance, filtration apparatus, and suction flask available and in operable condition?
Does desiccator have an adequate seal?
Is excess desiccator sealant removed?
Does desiccator have active color indicating desiccant?
Is the analytical balance capable of weighing to 0.1 mg?
Is the analytical balance serviced at least yearly?
Is the filter placed wrinkled surface up?
Is the filter washed with 3 successive 20 ml portions of distilled water under vacuum?
Is the filter dried in oven at 103-105°C for at least 1 hour?
After drying, is filter (and Gooch crucible or weighing dish) stored in desiccator until needed?
Is filter (and Gooch crucible or weighing dish) weighed correctly after cooling and before use?
Is filter or Gooch crucible handled with forceps or tongs?
Is sample well-mixed prior to filtration?
Is sample volume measured using appropriate device?
Is filter seated with distilled water prior to filtering sample?
Is sample filtered under vacuum?
After sample is filtered, is filter washed with 3 successive 10 ml portions of distilled water?
